extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the active FaceTime login ID of the current user. This attribute applies only to Mac.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh loginID=`/usr/libexec/plistbuddy -c Print ~/Library/Preferences/com.apple.imservice.FaceTime.plist | grep "LoginAs" | cut -d: -f2` if [ "loginID" != "" ]; then echo "<result> $loginID </result>" else echo "<result> No FaceTime login information found.</result>" fi
